isCompIdFound.description: temporary till we move FBC method from persist to indexer

realChecksumInfo.description: Sha in different cases can be overridden by fake value

buildRepo.description: updated only for Build during download

componentId.description: updated only for a single Go artifact during download

conanfile_py_path.description: updated only for Conan during download

flow_event.description: used to indicate which lane is used

pom_xml_path.description: updated only for Maven during download

rescan_attempts.description:
In case during scanning we discover that some component is missing (db corruption), we enter a "healing full-reindex mode":
Send the artifact message back the pipeline for full download and rescan - not applying any reuse -
re-adding all missing components in postgres/mongo for this artifact.

size.description: // The size of the artifact in bytes determines the appropriate queue for message processing

time_range.description: Same as the one used by HistoryScanMsg

xray_internal_anonymous_allowed.description:
As part of ticket XRAY-7274 - Xray stops accepting Anonymous users!
This flag should be true only when customer requires it and understand this is considered as a security concern!
